about_the_game:
Space Draw is a VR creation tool with 3D painting as the main playing method. Users can easily draw a fantastic virtual world.

The simple and easy to use operation design takes care of various types of users, so that users can quickly understand the fun of painting.

It provides a new creative concept different from traditional painting and subverts the understanding of traditional painting. Traditional painting is a 3D three-dimensional effect converted into a 2D plane effect.

Space Draw transforms the painting from a 2D plane to a 3D three-dimensional effect. It has clear visual hierarchy and more visual impact, enabling players to create as they wish.
